title: Lotus Emira plug-in hybrid coming in 2027
description: Lotus is moving ahead with rumored plans to build a plug-in hybrid version of the Emira with its new "Hyper Hybrid" system, CEO Feng Qingfeng told analysts during the automaker's second-quarter financial results call. This plug-in hybrid system will first appear in an SUV, likely the Eletre, as ...
titleSummary: Lotus Unveils Electric Muscle: Plug-In Hybrid Emira Set to Roar in '27
descriptionSummary: Lotus is reportedly pursuing a plug-in hybrid variant of the Emira, featuring its new "Hyper Hybrid" technology. The innovative powertrain is expected to debut in the Eletre SUV before being adapted for other models.

title: Women Drivers Myth-Busted: 2025 Data Shows Men Lead Fatalities
description: “Women are worse drivers” hangs around because it flatters a stereotype, not because it’s true. Deep down we all know it is a trope, and the newest numbers from all over the world smash it. In Great Britain (2024 provisional), 76% of road fatalities were male and 61% of all casualties were male, ...
titleSummary: "Men Take Lead in Deadly Crashes, Challenging Stereotypes About Female Drivers"
descriptionSummary: The notion that women are worse drivers persists due to its appeal as a stereotype, rather than any factual basis. New data globally reveals this trope is unfounded, with men consistently accounting for the majority of accidents and fatalities on roads.

title: Stellantis Recalls 219,000 U.S. Vehicles Over Rear-View Camera Failure
description: Stellantis is recalling more than 219,000 vehicles in the United States because the rear-view camera can simply stop working and show nothing just when you’re backing toward your neighbor’s trash cans.The recall covers high-volume workhorses the Ram ProMaster (over 141,000 vehicles affected) and ...
titleSummary: "Stellantis Issues Mass Recall of American Cars Due to Faulty Backup Cameras"
descriptionSummary: Stellantis is issuing a massive recall of over 219,000 US vehicles due to a rearview camera issue that can cause it to suddenly malfunction when reversing, potentially leaving drivers without a clear view - or a glimpse into their neighbor's trash cans.

title: Another wagon bites the dust: Volvo V90 production to end
description: Volvo is ending production of its biggest, most luxurious wagon for other markets. Autocar reports that production of the Volvo V90 will cease this month, leaving the Swedish automaker that built its reputation with models like the 240, 740, and 850 wagons with just one example of the body style. ...
titleSummary: "Swedish Icon Set to Roll Off Assembly Lines for Good"
descriptionSummary: Volvo is discontinuing its flagship wagon in select markets as the company shifts focus. Production of the V90 will halt this month, leaving Volvo's product lineup with a sole representative from a storied tradition of wagons that defined the brand.

title: Tesla Terminates Contractor at Giga Texas, 82 Workers Laid Off
description: Tesla has unexpectedly terminated a contract with MPW Industrial Services at Gigafactory Texas, leaving 82 employees jobless almost overnight. A WARN notice filed with the Texas Workforce Commission confirmed the decision, which took effect September 1. For the workers—technicians, ...
titleSummary: "Mass Layoff Rocks Tesla's Giga Texas Facility in Shocking Staff Cuts"
descriptionSummary: In a sudden move, Tesla cancelled its contract with MPW Industrial Services at Gigafactory Texas, abruptly ending employment for 82 workers as of September 1. A formal notice has been filed with the Texas Workforce Commission.

title: Should You Wait for the 2026 Armada or Buy the 2025 at a Discount?
description: The Nissan Armada entered a new generation for 2025, but the 2026 model year already brings a sharper reality: higher prices across the board. The base SV 4x2 now starts at $58,840, which is about $1,320 more than the outgoing version. The ceiling has also shifted, with the Platinum Reserve 4x4 ...
titleSummary: "Armada Delay: To Defer or Save with Last Year's Model?"
descriptionSummary: The 2026 Nissan Armada marks a significant pricing shift, with a new base price of $58,840 for the SV 4x2 trim, a $1,320 increase over its predecessor. Top-tier models now command even higher sums.

title: Kia GT1 Confirmed for 2027 Launch as Electric Grand Tourer
description: The Kia Stinger may have bowed out with a final V6 salute, but its spirit isn’t dead. Reports out of South Korea confirm that the long-rumored Kia GT1 project is back on track, targeting a 2027 launch as a flagship all-electric grand tourer. Positioned as Kia’s first model on ...
titleSummary: Kia's Long-Awaited Electric Flagship Set to Hit Roads in 2027
descriptionSummary: The curtains have closed on the Kia Stinger's V6 era, but its legacy lives on in the reborn Kia GT1 project, now back in development with a 2027 release date for an all-electric flagship grand tourer set to take center stage.

title: A Pricey Prelude: Honda’s Coupe Returns With Strings Attached
description: The Honda Prelude is set to return after a hiatus of more than two decades, this time as a Civic-based coupe with hybrid power. On paper, the recipe blends nostalgia with Honda’s latest electrified technology, but the reception has been mixed. Some welcome the idea of a hybrid sports coupe, while ...
titleSummary: "Honda's Revived Sportster Comes with a Hefty Bill to Match Its Style"
descriptionSummary: Honda's Prelude is reviving after a 20-year absence, reborn as a sporty Civic-based coupe with eco-friendly hybrid power. The comeback combines retro charm with cutting-edge tech, yet sparks debate among enthusiasts and critics alike.

title: Lexus Teases Big Reveal for 2025 Japan Mobility Show
description: The Japan Mobility Show, once known as the Tokyo Motor Show, has long been the stage for Japan's most important automotive debuts. The biennial event has seen the unveiling of important cars and icons. In recent times, Honda previewed the return of the Prelude with a sleek concept coupe in 2023, ...
titleSummary: Lexus to Unveil Its Most Ambitious Automotive Innovation Yet in Tokyo
descriptionSummary: The Japan Mobility Show has become the premier platform for showcasing Japan's cutting-edge automotive innovations, hosting pivotal debuts of influential vehicles that have captured the world's attention. This biennial event has been instrumental in shaping the industry.

title: Tesla Just Learned a $183 Million Lesson in Latest Gamble-Gone-Wrong
description: Tesla has lost $183 million more than it would’ve if it had accepted the initial $60 million settlement offer for a 2019 fatal crash involving one of the manufacturer’s Autopilot-engaged Model S vehicles. After Tesla declined the settlement proposal, offered on May 30, a jury awarded the estate of ...
titleSummary: "Tesla Takes a Shocking Hit in Latest Misjudged Business Bet"
descriptionSummary: A fatal 2019 car accident involving an Autopilot-equipped Tesla led to a $60 million settlement offer that was initially rejected by the company. The rejection ultimately resulted in a significantly larger award to the victim's family from a subsequent jury verdict.

title: Ram 1500 RHO Owners Finally Get The Loud Button They Wanted
description: It may not be a true replacement for the TRX, but the Ram 1500 RHO is a strong alternative to the V6-powered Ford F-150 Raptor. Not only is it powerful and capable off-road, but we found the RHO to be a surprisingly comfortable and competent daily driver. But Ram is always looking to improve its ...
titleSummary: "Ram 1500 Owners Rev Up with Long-Awaited Loud Exhaust Feature Activation"
descriptionSummary: The Ram 1500 RHO stands out as a compelling choice for those seeking a high-performance pickup that rivals the Ford F-150 Raptor's V6 engine. Its impressive off-road prowess pairs with unexpected refinement on paved roads, making it an attractive daily driver option.

title: Mercedes EQE Faces Early Retirement Next Year, And Here’s Why
description: Mercedes-Benz has had a tough time with its range of electric vehicles lately, which are failing to resonate with the company’s customer base. Some of that is due to a slowing demand for EVs, while some of it is because people just don’t find the brand’s EQ models to be as appealing with their ...
titleSummary: Mercedes' Electric Game-Changer to Get Axed After Just One Model Cycle
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz's electric vehicle lineup has struggled to gain traction with customers, partly due to waning interest in EVs and partly because its EQ models haven't quite struck a chord with buyers.

title: Ford Mustang GTD Is So Wide Ford Had To Find A Loophole In The Law
description: The new Ford Mustang GTD is so wide that it nearly crossed into commercial-truck territory. According to federal rules, vehicles that exceed a certain width—like the Ford Bronco Raptor or Ram TRX—are required to wear amber safety lights similar to those on heavy-duty trucks. These lights aren’t ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Wider Than Allowed Mustang GTD Sparks Regulatory Dance"
descriptionSummary: The Ford Mustang GTD's expansive width has pushed it close to commercial truck territory, prompting a regulatory response: it must now sport distinctive yellow warning lights typically reserved for larger vehicles.

title: This Lamborghini Dealership Is 1/18 Scale — And You Can Actually Afford The Cars
description: Forget glass showrooms in Dubai or Beverly Hills. The most jaw-dropping Lamborghini dealership you’ll see this year fits on a shelf. A YouTube collector has lined up dozens of 1/18 scale die-cast Lamborghinis in glass cases, creating a miniature dealership where Aventadors and Urus' shine ...
titleSummary: "Mini Marvels: Tiny Luxury Car Shop Lets Everyone Drive a Dream Vehicle Within Budget"
descriptionSummary: A tiny, yet tantalizing tribute to the world's most exotic cars has been created on a shelf. A YouTube collector has meticulously arranged dozens of 1/18 scale die-cast Lamborghinis in glass displays, showcasing miniature marvels like Aventadors and Uruses.

title: Is Honda Prepping a Performance Prelude for Tokyo?
description: For decades, the Tokyo Motor Show – now rebranded as the Japan Mobility Show – has served as the proving ground for Japanese automakers to showcase their most ambitious work. It has been the birthplace of many halo cars, some of which went on to define entire segments. The now-retired Nissan GT-R ...
titleSummary: "Tokyo Motor Show Teaser Suggests Honda's Next High-Performance Model is Coming Soon"
descriptionSummary: For years, the Tokyo Motor Show has been the premier platform for Japan's top automakers to unveil their boldest innovations and vision for the future, yielding iconic models that have shaped the industry and redefined automotive excellence.

title: Will Carmaker Pushback Delay Your Switch to an EV?
description: European carmakers are pushing back against the EU’s ambitious plan for a 100% reduction in car CO₂ emissions by 2035, saying the timeline may be more political dream than practical reality. In a direct appeal, industry leaders warned that the proposed 2035 zero-emission ban risks overestimating ...
titleSummary: Electric Vehicle Sales May Stall Amid Carmaker Resistance to New Regulations.
descriptionSummary: European automakers are questioning the EU's goal of eliminating all car emissions by 2035, citing concerns that the deadline is overly ambitious and may not be grounded in current technological capabilities or market realities.

title: 2026 Ford Maverick Pricing Means More Problems For Hyundai Santa Cruz
description: Earlier this month, we took a look at 2025 sales (so far) for the only two compact pickup trucks on the market, and the figures showed that Ford’s Maverick is handsomely outselling the Hyundai Santa Cruz. In fact, the gap between the two has widened this year, and that looks set to continue based ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai's Santa Cruz Faces Steep Competition from Affordable 2026 Ford Maverick"
descriptionSummary: As of recently, we revisited the sales data for the sole compact pickup trucks on the market, with the Ford Maverick significantly outpacing its Hyundai Santa Cruz counterpart in 2025 sales so far. The disparity is growing.

title: BYD Takes on BMW and Porsche, Opens Customer-Accessible Racetrack
description: BYD officially stands for “Build Your Dreams,” but the Chinese automaker is starting to worry that its accessibility has possibly put a damper on the “dreaming” aspect. Claimed by some to instead stand for “Be Your Driver” — due to their cars’ overwhelming presence on Chinese roads and suitability ...
titleSummary: Electric Challenger: BYD Unveils Thrilling Test Track for Performance Enthusiasts
descriptionSummary: BYD's original mission, "Build Your Dreams," may be at odds with reality as its mass production has resulted in a ubiquity that could be diminishing the exclusivity of owning one of its vehicles, leading some to joke it should stand for "Be Your Driver" instead.

title: 2026 Toyota Corolla Trim Matchup: Base LE Vs. Flagship XSE
description: If you want a no-nonsense budget sedan, the Toyota Corolla absolutely needs to be on your list. It’s cheaper than the Honda Civic, highly efficient, and promises bulletproof reliability. No, you won’t get anywhere quickly, but there’s a GR Corolla for enthusiasts. If you’ve decided on a Corolla, it ...
titleSummary: "Corolla Showdown: Budget-Friendly LE vs. High-End XSE"
descriptionSummary: For those seeking a practical and affordable sedan, the Toyota Corolla is an attractive option. Boasting competitive pricing, impressive fuel efficiency, and a reputation for durability, it's a solid choice for everyday driving.

title: 10 Best States for Teen Drivers
description: Despite its reputation for erratic city traffic surrounded by congested metro areas, data from WalletHub has ranked New York as the safest state in the U.S. for teen drivers. All 50 states were evaluated in three primary categories: safety, economic environment, and driving laws. These categories ...
titleSummary: "Racking Up Safety: Top Spots for Young Behind-the-Wheel Graduates"
descriptionSummary: New York stands out as a surprisingly safe haven for teenage drivers, defying its notorious traffic reputation. WalletHub's comprehensive analysis ranks the state first among all 50 US states in terms of teen driver safety.

title: Million-Dollar Mercedes: Another 300 SL Roadster Climbs Past Seven Figures
description: Despite being rarer, the Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Roadster has always lived in the long shadow of its winged predecessor. The Gullwing Coupe is the icon, the poster car, and the one that dominates auction headlines. Even replicas garner so much attention, some even asking for more money than a Ferrari ...
titleSummary: "Seven-Figure 300 SL Sells for a Price That's Simply Priceless to Collectors"
descriptionSummary: The Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Roadster has long played second fiddle to its sleeker, more iconic cousin - the Gullwing Coupe. Yet, this rarer roadster holds its own in a world of supercars and knockoff fame.

title: 2026 Subaru Outback Prices Jump — Should You Buy the 2025 Model Instead?
description: The Subaru Outback is one of the last wagons (albeit rugged) still available in the US. With standard all-wheel drive, decent ground clearance, and a loyal following, it has long been the halfway point between a family car and an adventure-ready crossover. However, everything changed with the ...
titleSummary: New Subaru Outback Pricing Hikes Spur Question: Hold Out for Last Year's Model?
descriptionSummary: In a market dominated by crossovers, the Subaru Outback remains one of the few rugged wagons still available in the US. Its standard all-wheel drive and generous ground clearance make it an ideal compromise between practicality and off-road capability.

title: The Last Big Audi RS Hangs On By The Skin Of Its Teeth
description: As Audi reinvents its nomenclature, the automaker is slimming down its lineup. The two most recent victims, the A7 and sportier S7, won't make it to 2026. However, the hi-po Audi RS7 manages to survive. According to an Audi spokesperson, the sedans will no longer be sold in the North American ...
titleSummary: "Audi's Top-Performer Faces Final Farewell After Years of Unyielding Performance"
descriptionSummary: Audi is streamlining its lineup as part of a broader naming convention overhaul. The A7 and S7 have been dropped from the company's 2026 plans, but the high-performance RS7 sedan has been spared. It will remain available for North American buyers.

title: The 2026 Porsche Macan Electric Has A New Feature Every Car Should Have
description: Let's all own up to something right now: no matter how long you've been driving, reversing in a tight spot is tough. I drive something like 30 new cars in a given year, and without failure (save for Miatas and the like), it's pretty easy to feel more than a little uneasy backing up your new car ...
titleSummary: "Porsche's Next-Gen Macan Sets a New Standard for In-Car Comfort and Convenience"
descriptionSummary: Reversing into tight spaces can be a daunting task, even for seasoned drivers. I've had the chance to get familiar with numerous vehicles, but still find myself getting a bit nervous when trying to maneuver a new car into a small space.

title: Cadillac F1's First Race Car Will Probably Be a Ferrari
description: The irony is almost too perfect to believe. Cadillac F1, America's long-awaited return to Formula 1, will likely take its first tentative laps around a race circuit in a Ferrari SF-23 race car. Team principal Graeme Lowdon confirmed that Cadillac plans to use a rival squad for its Testing of ...
titleSummary: "Ferrari Rivalry Shifts Gears as Cadillac Plans Its High-Performance Debut"
descriptionSummary: In a surprising twist, Cadillac's maiden voyage into Formula 1 is set to begin with a test drive in a Ferrari, the very car it will eventually compete against on the track.

title: Fully Loaded Toyota Corolla Hatch Now Cheaper Than Base Honda Civic Hatch
description: A month after announcing updates for the 2026 Corolla Sedan, it’s now the 2026 Corolla Hatchback’s turn to receive its annual update. Toyota already revealed that the 2026 version of the hatch will be available with a sporty new FX Edition trim, but now we have full details of all the changes, ...
titleSummary: Toyota's Top-Tier Corolla Trims Outprice Honda Civic at Entry Level
descriptionSummary: Following hot on the heels of the refreshed Corolla Sedan, Toyota is now giving its compact Corolla Hatchback a similar mid-cycle facelift for 2026. The updated model boasts a sleek new FX Edition trim and a range of other enhancements.

title: This Tiny EV Truck Can Take On The Toyota Tacoma
description: Telo doesn't quite have the same brand recognition as "Toyota," but you should be aware of this new player in the truck world if you like two things: a five-foot bed and an electric powertrain. Thanks to some clever packaging, Telo promises a truck the size of a Mini Cooper can haul like a Tacoma, ...
titleSummary: "Mini Electric Pickup Takes on the Tacoma in David vs Goliath Showdown"
descriptionSummary: Meet Telo, a rising star in the truck market that's making waves with its compact design and surprising hauling capabilities, all thanks to its efficient electric powertrain and clever packaging.

title: New Porsche Cayenne EV Promises to End Range Anxiety
description: For many buyers, the biggest hesitation with EVs is still range anxiety. Porsche’s new Cayenne EV looks set to put that worry to rest, with the carmaker claiming more than 373 miles on a single charge. Add in blistering performance and surprising practicality, and this electric SUV is shaping up to ...
titleSummary: "Electric Revolution on Wheels: Porsche's Pioneering Cayenne Takes Aim at Charging Fears"
descriptionSummary: Porsche's latest Cayenne EV addresses a major concern for many potential buyers: range anxiety. With an impressive estimated 373-mile range per charge, the car boasts exceptional capability and unexpected practicality, paired with electrifying performance.

title: Mansory Targets U.S. Buyers With Subtly Tuned Mercedes-AMG SL 63
description: Mansory is finally pointing its carbon-fiber paintbrush at U.S. customers, starting with the Mercedes-AMG SL 63. And against all odds, it’s not a caricature. Instead of gold-plated grills and diamond-encrusted door handles, this SL gets subtle aggression: carbon chin spoiler, side skirts, hood ...
titleSummary: "Mansory Ups the Ante with Luxurious, Performance-Tuned Mercedes-Benz Roadster"
descriptionSummary: Mansory is bringing its signature style to American roads with the Mercedes-AMG SL 63. The result is understated yet potent, with sleek additions like a carbon fiber chin spoiler and side sills that amplify its aggressive lines.

title: Ford Recall Tally Climbs Again With 1.3 Million Vehicles Involved
description: Ford might be on a roll at setting lap record times at the Nürburgring, but it has not had an easy time in recent months with recalls. The company has faced multiple safety campaigns across different nameplates, and August has brought the most extensive action yet. In a single day, Ford disclosed ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Safety Woes Deepen with Record-Breaking New Wave of Recalls"
descriptionSummary: Ford's recent streak of setting blistering lap times at the Nürburgring is overshadowed by a series of recalls, as the automaker navigates multiple safety concerns spanning various models. This month saw a major escalation with numerous campaigns launched simultaneously.

title: This 718 Spyder RS Is Porsche Mexico’s Tribute to a Legendary Race
description: The name "Carrera" may be synonymous with being the name of the standard, entry model of the Porsche 911, but its origin is much richer than you might actually think. In Spanish, the word 'Carrera' means 'race,' and as a company built on its racing success, its use of the word pays tribute to a ...
titleSummary: "Porsche Pays Homage to Racing Heritage with Exclusive Spyder RS Edition"
descriptionSummary: Behind the iconic name "Carrera," lies a fascinating story that delves deeper than its status as a standard 911 model. Derived from Spanish, "carrera" translates to "race," reflecting Porsche's rich history and legacy built on motorsports triumphs.

title: Ram 1500 Hemi V8 Deliveries Begin After Quick Turnaround
description: The Ram 1500 survived a single model year without the Hemi V8 – "survived" being the operative word, as customers have been eagerly awaiting its return since its absence. For a time, the newer Hurricane twin-turbo inline-six replaced the long-serving 5.7-liter eight-pot in the Ram 1500. While the ...
titleSummary: "Hemi-Powered Ram 1500 Trucks Hit Roads After Swift Production Restart"
descriptionSummary: The 2022 Ram 1500 saw a brief hiatus from its iconic Hemi V8 engine, but its absence was short-lived as customers eagerly anticipated its return. The Hurricane twin-turbo six-cylinder temporarily filled the gap, offering a compelling alternative for a year.

title: Porsche's New Weissach Legend Is Coming September 7
description: The next iteration of the current generation Porsche 911 is on the way, set to be shown a week tomorrow, on September 7. The new model was shown today in a teaser via Instagram, pulling away under a hard launch. Predictably, it sounds decidedly like a 911, but there's also a hint of something else ...
titleSummary: "Exclusive Weissach Package Unveiled: Porsche Set to Debut Highly Anticipated Model September 7"
descriptionSummary: The next evolution of the iconic Porsche 911 is coming, with an official reveal scheduled for September 7. A cryptic preview on Instagram offers a tantalizing glimpse, showcasing the new model's dynamic acceleration and unmistakable 911 DNA.

title: This Cute Robot Dog May Help Build Your Next Mercedes-Benz
description: If you’ve ever watched videos of a car factory, you likely know that robots play a significant role in producing the cars on the road today. Usually, these robots typically appear as large orange or yellow arms that weld components together, paint body panels, and/or handle heavy lifting or ...
titleSummary: "Meet Robby, the Canine Companion Shaping Future Rides at Mercedes-Benz"
descriptionSummary: On the assembly line, robotic assistants work tirelessly behind the scenes, their mechanical limbs expertly manipulating metal and paint to shape the vehicles that fill our roads.

title: New Auto Loan Tax Break Could Save You Money, But There’s a Catch
description: Tucked inside President Trump’s recently signed tax law is a provision aimed squarely at reshaping consumer behavior. Starting in 2025, buyers who finance a new car assembled in the U.S. can claim a tax deduction on the loan interest they pay. On paper, it’s a significant shift. The measure applies ...
titleSummary: "Tax Relief for Car Buyers: A Double-Edged Financial Opportunity"
descriptionSummary: A little-noticed clause within President Trump's recent tax overhaul is set to revolutionize consumer behavior by 2025, when buyers of American-made cars will be eligible for a valuable tax break on their car loan interest payments.

title: Malaysia’s $500K Luxury Coupe Packs 810 HP and a Supercharged Hemi
description: Malaysia's auto industry isn't well known in the West, although it does boast the duo of Perodua and Proton, mostly making basic vehicles that only appear in small numbers outside their home region (although Proton did own Lotus for a time). Bucking that trend is Bufori, which since the 1980s has ...
titleSummary: Malaysia- Built Beast Roars to Life with Monster 810 HP V8 Muscle
descriptionSummary: In Southeast Asia's automotive underbelly, one brand stands out from Malaysia's largely niche market: Bufori. Founded decades ago, this company has consistently produced high-quality vehicles with a global appeal, defying regional conventions.

title: GM slows production of two of its most expensive EVs
description: General Motors is reducing production of two of its biggest and most expensive electric vehicles at Factory Zero, the automaker's dedicated EV assembly plant in Hamtramck, Michigan, adjacent to Detroit. The first and second shifts for the GMC Hummer EV and Cadillac Escalade IQ will be idled between ...
titleSummary: GM Cuts Back on Luxury EV Output Amid Market Shifts and High Costs
descriptionSummary: General Motors is temporarily scaling back production of its premium electric vehicles at its Factory Zero facility in Hamtramck, Michigan, where workers on the GMC Hummer EV and Cadillac Escalade EQ lines will see reduced shifts.

title: Subaru’s More Capable Forester Wilderness Gets Hefty Price Bump Over Predecessor
description: When Subaru launched the all-new Forester for the 2025 model year, it continued selling the previous-generation Wilderness variant at the same time. This is the most off-road capable version of the Forester, which competes against rivals like the Toyota RAV4 Woodland and Honda CR-V TrailSport. The ...
titleSummary: "Wilderness Upgrade Comes at a Steep Cost for Subaru's Most Adventurous SUV Model Yet"
descriptionSummary: Subaru is simultaneously phasing out last year's Wilderness model while introducing a brand-new Forester for 2025. The outgoing Wilderness boasts exceptional off-road prowess, rivaling offerings from the likes of Toyota RAV4 Woodland and Honda CR-V TrailSport.

title: Hyundai Boosts U.S. Investment To $26 Billion — Steel, EVs, and 25,000 Jobs
description: Hyundai isn’t tiptoeing into the U.S. market anymore. It’s throwing down $26 billion through 2028, up from the $21 billion it had already pledged. The cash is earmarked for everything from steel and robotics to EV production — and, crucially, for shoring up its political and economic future in ...
titleSummary: Hyundai Commits Hefty $26 Billion to US Expansion, Steel, Electric Vehicles, and Jobs Boom
descriptionSummary: Hyundai is making a bold investment in the US market, committing a significant $26 billion by 2028 - a substantial increase from its initial pledge. The funds will support a wide range of initiatives, including manufacturing, innovation, and strategic partnerships to secure its long-term success.
